Changes a user's username to a new, valid value.

Changes a user's username to a new value, if the new value is valid.
RMIClient - Class in marno.client
The RMI implementation of the Marno client.
RMIClient(ClientGUI) - Constructor for class marno.client.RMIClient
Ties the client to its GUI window, then exports this client as a remote RMI object, ready for the server to use.

The RMI interface implemented by RMI clients.
RMIConfig - Class in marno.protocol
Configuration directives common to RMI servers and clients.

RMISession(String, RMIClientInterface) - Constructor for class marno.server.RMISession

run() - Method in class marno.client.SocketClient
Listens for incoming messages from the server.
run() - Method in class marno.server.RMIServer
Initializes the RMI registry and binds the server to it.
run() - Method in class marno.server.Server
Makes the server run indifinitely.
run() - Method in class marno.server.SocketServer
Makes the server run forever.
run() - Method in class marno.server.SocketSession
Runs while the socket can still be read from or until the client quits.
